gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: National Snow and Ice Data Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains precise latitudes, longitudes, and heights above the ellipsoid for all photons downlinked by the ATLAS sensor. Geophysical corrections are applied to photon heights and each photon is classified as signal or background. Segmented data are included at a 20-meter along-track length and geophysical corrections, atmosphere corrections, and surface cover (land ice, sea ice, ocean, land, inland water) are provided for each segment.
